About the Company: Chennai Meenakshi Multispeciality Hospital Ltd offers the following services Cardiologist,Cosmetic and Plastic Surgeon,Diabetologist,Diabetologist and Endocrinologist,Dermatologist,Dentist,ENT,Gastro Surgeon,General Surgeon,Gynecologist,General Medicine,Vascular Surgeon,Minimal Ascess General and Metabolic Tumours Surgeon,Neurologist,Neuro Surgeon,Orthopaedics,Paediatrician, Gastro Entrologist and Opthalmology.The hospital also has a well equipped modern laboratory functional round-the-clock and manned by an efficient staff.A state-of-art CT scan is available for various diagnostic purposes and manned 24 hours for any emergency services. 24 hours x-ray services are also available.
